tiled.mapeditor.plugin
Class TiledPlugin

java.lang.Object
  tiled.mapeditor.plugin.TiledPlugin
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.FileFilter, PluggableMapIO
public class TiledPlugin
extends java.lang.Object
implements PluggableMapIO, java.io.FileFilter

A true "plugin" implementation that handles both reading and writing as the case may be. Instantiated for every reader/writer pair by the PluginClassLoader when all plugins are loaded.
